pr_title: Add missing dependency to port state topo

timeline.message:
Add missing dependency to port state topo

UpdatePortPropertiesRequest is a part of nbworker-messaging.
Added dependency to build.gradle

Closes: #3461

timeline.bodyText: If some object used outside specific topology (that owns messaging packet) should it be moved into a more "common/shared" messaging packet?
timeline.author: surabujin
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -13,6 +13,7 @@ dependencies {
     runtimeClasspath project(path: ':base-storm-topology', configuration: 'releaseArtifacts')
     implementation project(':kilda-reporting')
     implementation project(':network-messaging')
+    implementation project(':nbworker-messaging')
